Description.Name: To Be Continued
Description.Details:
Congratulations...!

If you're seeing this you have entered into the dark machinations and intrigue of the Indri Consortium, the mysterious Mr. Smith and his 'Fixer' and... survived... so far.

You have rescued a Countess and a Governor plus several tons of top quality beef, made several enemies, fostered Allies and made a little money along the way.

This is just a pause in the frantic pace of what is 'The Baron's War' and I hope you'll be here to the end.

Be on the lookout for the continuation... 'Operation Deep Strike'.

Description.Name: Continue...
Description.Details:
Acknowledgements foremost for XyerX for a wonderful remastering of the HBS BattleTech game and especially for waking the AI and also, for his continual insistance for attention to detail.

For FrostRaptor who provided the Contract launching flexibility that brings the actual pace of a 'Flashpoint' to life.

For CWolf's patience in helping me research the inner workings of the BT code base. If I miss mentioning any one person or group specifically, it is not intentional and totally my omission as I don't get a lot of space in here to type stuff.

Acknolegdments.
HBS Battletech.
Cwolf - Mission Control, Extended Conversation and ConverseteK
FrostRaptor - IRBTModUtils and Maprandomizer
Amechwarrior - who ignited my Flashpoint creation.
To Tex of the BPL - The 'voice' of the Innershpere - I salute you.

And finally, to those who are reading this - you, who have spent your valuable time

playing our Flashpoints. We hope you find them enjoyable and challenging.

Grab the 'Bash Bars' and Hang on, as the ride is not yet over.
